Member of the Giant Warrior Pirates under Dorry and Brogy

keyMoments.title: Giant Warrior Pirates Disbanded
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals that the Giant Warrior Pirates disbanded after their co-captains Dorry and Brogy began their century-long duel on Little Garden.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for why Oimo and Kashii left their crew and went searching for their captains.

keyMoments.title: Blueno Faces Luffy
keyMoments.description: CP9 agent Blueno confronts Luffy at Enies Lobby, explaining that attacking the World Government is a serious criminal offense.
keyMoments.significance: First major battle between Luffy and a CP9 member at Enies Lobby.

keyMoments.title: Blueno's Tekkai Broken
keyMoments.description: Blueno's defensive Tekkai technique is broken through by Luffy's attack, showing the CP9 agent's limits.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Luffy has grown strong enough to overcome CP9's Rokushiki techniques.
